item.description:
So-this was supposed to be the second May meetup
but I have plans on Saturday. Fort Washington is closed due to
renovations and this is a great alternative with street parking and
all. I have not visited this spot but it sounds great-here is the
link: (see #4 in the left column) http://www.cambridged...

I've also gone raw with the dogs so the treats will be homemade by me-absolutely organic and raw!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there with Simon and Louie!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: June 1 meetup
